title: SOMETHING THAT HAS BUGGED ME FOR A REALLY LONG TIME, WILL IT NEVER CHANGE?
body:
Man, i feel like riot REALLY should provide wayyyyyy  better previews of skins/chroma's. 
Just a simple pop up window to really see what your'e buying. Ya its not that big a deal, just check it out on youtube but, come..on..

You see this epic painting of the skin but no actual in-game model

And the chroma's you get this tiny tiny little window where can barely even tell what the heck your'e looking at. 

TLDR; The lack of preview availability when it comes to buying skins/chromas has ALWAYS bugged me.
Is it just me? Or is there anyone else out there that is annoyed by this? 

**THANK U FOR READING***
***closertoinfinity***
